item.title: Resolving the Log4J Crisis
item.description: Resolving the Log4J Crisis: A Tale of Teamwork and Swift Action

item.title: krypter
item.description:
A node wrapper around the native crypto module which uses the below capabilities

  • Algorithm: aes-256-cbc
  • default key and iv generation
  • Crypt main class
  • a encrypt method
  • a decrypt method

item.title: npm shortcuts
item.description: If you have always wondered what are all the npm commands and their shortcuts, here is a curated list of them

item.title: Keep your forks updated
item.description: You are looking to contribute to an awesome project on GitHub and you finally find it and fork the repo. a few weeks later you worked on the forked repo but are afraid the fork is way behind the original repo. how would you keep it up to date? here is how

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2018
item.description: 2018 was my first hacktoberfest, was super exited to be contributing to open source.
